Identification.LongTitle: Designating the Minister of Justice and the President of the Treasury Board as Ministers for Purposes of Certain Sections of the Act

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to the definition designated Minister in section 3 of the Privacy Act, is pleased hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: to revoke Order in Council P.C. 1983-432 of 17th February, 1983*;

Footnote.Text: SI/83-49, 1983 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 1037

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: to designate the Minister of Justice, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, to act as the Minister for the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition head in section 3, subsection 12(3), paragraphs 77(1)(a), (d), (g) and (l) and subsection 77(2) of the Act; and

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: to designate the President of the Treasury Board, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, to act as the Minister for all other purposes of the Act.
